text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Let us lead the pieces to convergence ——

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: The information affirmed by the client…… The alibis… The narratives of witnesses… One truth emerges from these ——

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Hah…… Hahahahaha!! So that's how it is! All was revealed to me! "Every mystery has been unraveled"!!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: "The Missing Carrot Hamburger Steak". Hmph, it appears that this case was a bit too elementary to quench my thirst……
